players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob, I'm concerned about Charlie's behavior last night. We need to discuss this further."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana that we should discuss Charlie's behavior last night. It's important for the safety of our town."

Charlie: "I have nothing to hide. I was in my house last night, and I didn't leave until morning. I believe we should focus on finding the real killer instead of accusing each other without evidence."
